name: Cusano - Cafe - Robusto
additionalNotes: Cusano cigars have been a household name among many cigar smokers. Each cigar features an unparalleled quality and an excellent draw. The Cusano Cafe CC is a medium-to-full-bodied smoke with notes of spices, earth, coffee, and roasted nuts. Featuring an Ecuador Sun Grown wrapper and aged binder and filler tobaccos from the Dominican Republic, the CC is an economical 20-count bundled cigar with anÂ astonishing quality at a great price.
